content: **new adult large size ** instead of making a hat with straight lines why not make one with a little more style this is the original brain waves beanie it always has been and always will be free for you if you like this design please check out my others 1 and help support a work at home mom me looking for a free coffee cozy pattern 2 to go with your beanie you know you are finished size child about 18-20 head circumference adult about 20-22 head circumference this pattern includes a detailed video tutorial for the adult size to help you if you get stuck you have permission to sell finished items made from my patterns but do not use my pictures if you sell online please link back to my shop original design by liz from playin hooky designs http //www playinhookydesigns com pattern is written in standard us crochet terms i offer free customer help after every pattern purchase please email me 3 or send me a message with your questions don t be fooled by imitations this is the original brain waves beanie thank you to kristy from carriage house portrait studio 4 for the photography 1 http //www ravelry com/designers/liz-mcqueen 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/brain-waves-coffee-cozy 3 mailto liz@playinhookydesigns com 4 http //carriagehouseportraitstudio com/
